message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. I can meet you halfway from my original offer, so how about $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90, but I can offer you a slight discount from my previous offer. How about $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer. How about $105?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. I can offer you $115, which is my best price for now. If you're willing to meet me here, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I'm getting close to my own minimum price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer. How about $107.50?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not sure if I can go any lower. I can offer you $112.50, which is as low as I'm willing to go. If you're willing to meet me here, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I'm really close to my own minimum price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer. How about $109?
